tool.name: Bam to ScIdx output statistics
tool.command: <expand macro="non_ready_states" /> <expand macro="single_input_check" /> <expand macro="single_input_init" /> <expand macro="single_input_cmd_start" /> python $__tool_directory__/bam_to_scidx_output_stats.py <expand macro="single_input_cmd_end" /> --chrom_len_file ${chromInfo}
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates statistics on the output of the **Convert BAM to ScIdx** tool in the **CEGR Galaxy ChIP-exo** pipeline. These statistics include the genome coverage, which is determined using the following calculation.
- number of lines in input dataset / genome size = genome coverage
A JSON dictionary containing the run, sample and genome reference, along with the above statistics is sent via a POST to the PEGR REST API where the information is stored to support the CEGR ChIP-exo statistics reports.
